API_Description: Allows the `oStream` object to be decoded with the specified encoding type, `cEncoder` . It returns a decoded `ReadStream` object. Typically, it is used to access data returned as part of a SOAP method that was encoded in Base64 or hex encoding.

oStream.description: A stream object to be decoded with the specified encoding type.

cEncoder.description: Permissible values for this string are “hex” (hex-encoded) and “base64” (Base 64-encoded).
